summary: Completed comprehensive testing of theme switching and language selection features for IHL MUN 2026 website. All core functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Theme toggle button switches between light and dark themes correctly
CSS variables update properly for both themes (background, surface, text colors)
Language selector opens and displays EN, RU, UZ options
Russian translation working - navigation and content translate correctly
Uzbek translation working - navigation and content translate correctly
English translation working - can switch back from other languages
Theme and language settings persist after page refresh via localStorage
All pages (home, committees, selection-process, about, media) maintain theme consistency
Mobile navigation includes both theme toggle and language selector
Theme toggle shows correct icons (sun for dark theme, moon for light theme)
Language selector shows globe icon with current language code
